/usr/bin/c++       -fPIC -march=opteron -mtune=opteron   -msse -msse2 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -O3 -DNDEBUG -g3 -funroll-loops  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/optixHello.dir/optixHello.cpp.o  -o ../bin/optixHello -Wl,-rpath,/home/blayze/Software/Optix-6.0.0/NVIDIA-OptiX-SDK-6.0.0-linux64/SDK/build/lib:/home/blayze/Software/Optix-6.0.0/NVIDIA-OptiX-SDK-6.0.0-linux64/lib64:/opt/cuda/lib64 ../lib/libsutil_sdk.so /home/blayze/Software/Optix-6.0.0/NVIDIA-OptiX-SDK-6.0.0-linux64/lib64/liboptix.so -Wl,--disable-new-dtags -lm -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGL -lGLU /opt/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
